user_instruction: 'Reply to the Bright Futures Scholarship Foundation'"'"'s request for more details on the student'"'"'s achievements through email (bf_scholarship_foundation@gmail.com). You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Michael Smith’s Updated Academic Achievements and Supporting Materials  

Dear Mr. John [Last Name],

I hope you are doing well. I am writing on behalf of the Bright Futures Scholarship Foundation regarding Michael Smith’s scholarship application. To complete our evaluation, we would greatly appreciate it if you could provide the following information at your earliest convenience:

• Michael’s most recent transcript, including both GPA and any weighted or unweighted distinctions  
• A brief summary of notable academic awards, honors, or extracurricular leadership roles from the past two school years  
• Confirmation of any advanced coursework (AP, IB, dual-enrollment, etc.) in which Michael is currently enrolled or has completed  
• Any additional context you feel highlights Michael’s academic promise (e.g., capstone projects, independent studies, or competitions)

If Ms. Thompson’s recommendation is already available, please feel free to forward it as well or let us know where we might access it.  

For your convenience, you are welcome to upload the documents directly to our secure portal, attach them in a reply to this email, or—if you prefer—share a link from your Notion workspace. Should you need any assistance or additional time, just let me know.

Thank you very much for your time and support of Michael’s candidacy. We look forward to receiving the materials.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
Scholarship Program Coordinator  
Bright Futures Scholarship Foundation  
bf_scholarship_foundation@gmail.com

final_output:

Dear Mr. John [Last Name],

I hope you are doing well. I am writing on behalf of the Bright Futures Scholarship Foundation regarding Michael Smith’s scholarship application. To complete our evaluation, we would greatly appreciate it if you could provide the following information at your earliest convenience:

If Ms. Thompson’s recommendation is already available, please feel free to forward it as well or let us know where we might access it.  

For your convenience, you are welcome to upload the documents directly to our secure portal, attach them in a reply to this email, or—if you prefer—share a link from your Notion workspace. Should you need any assistance or additional time, just let me know.

Thank you very much for your time and support of Michael’s candidacy. We look forward to receiving the materials.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
Scholarship Program Coordinator  
Bright Futures Scholarship Foundation  
bf_scholarship_foundation@gmail.com
